title: Did David Attenboro say, "I'm not aware of any cruel animal like the Israelis? "
subtitle: A stray comment on an Iranian news website formed the basis for a strange gesture involving Sir David Attenboro.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: David Attenboro said, "I am not aware of any cruel animal like Israelis" as part of a harmful attack on the country's treatment of the Palestinian people.
